name: Scarsupial
description: The Scarsupial is a small and agile beast characterized by its strong legs and climbing abilities, capable of navigating treetops effortlessly.
memorable: Its ability to avoid falling damage and knock enemies prone after pouncing from heights sets it apart as a formidable foe.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey effectively while utilizing vertical environment advantages.
relations: Potentially encountered alongside other small beasts or in regions shared with climbing predators.
environment: Typically found in forested areas or regions where climbing is beneficial.
strengths: High mobility and strength make it an adept ambusher in a variety of terrains.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence makes it simple-minded and potentially predictable in tactics.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with claw and bite, dealing slashing and piercing damage respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Vertical Pounce, which allows it to knock opponents prone while following up with a bite attack.
senses: It has a passive perception of 13, allowing it to detect hidden threats at an average level.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, enhancing its ability to notice threats in its environment.
additional_information: Perfect Landing allows it to avoid fall damage.
Can take a bonus action to Dash or Disengage with Scrabble.
Strong physical attributes with a strength score of 16.
Can strike quickly from above using Vertical Pounce.
Resilient constitution with a score of 16.
test_queries: agile climbing beast with strong legs
small animal that pounces from trees
resilient creature that never takes fall damage
beast that can knock enemies prone
